snippet: Yahoo announced the start of Yahoo Esports, an online channel devoted to video games, including commentary, interviews with top players and more.
abstract: Yahoo announces it has started Yahoo Esports, online channel dedicated to video games.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo announced the start of Yahoo Esports, an online channel devoted to video games, including commentary, interviews with top players and more.

headline.main: Yahoo Joins E-Sports Rush With Online Channel’s Debut
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Joins E-Sports Rush With Online Channel’s Debut
